common.noProvidersConfigured: No API keys configured. Please add one in settings.
common.noModelsAvailable: No enabled models available for your configured providers.
common.generateDocsDescriptionSingle: Refine the documentation for a branch. Add instructions or explanations to clarify what has to be refined.
common.generateDocsDescriptionDiff: Generate documentation from source branch to target branch for selected project.
common.selectProjectFirst: Select a project to choose branches
common.selectFile: Select a file to preview the diff.
common.noDocumentationChanges: No documentation changes were produced for this diff.
common.commitSuccessDescription: Your documentation changes have been successfully committed to the documentation branch.
common.mergeSuccessDescription: The documentation changes have been merged into your source branch.
common.documentationAvailable: Documentation is now available in branch
common.mergeDisabledUncommittedChanges: Cannot merge: You are currently on the source branch with uncommitted changes. Please commit or stash your changes first.
common.confirmApprovalDescription: The documentation has been automatically committed. Click Approve to confirm and view the success message.
common.docInstructionsLabel: Precisions or instructions for this specific documentation generation
common.docInstructionsPlaceholder: Ex: Only document the end-user aspect of the PR. Do not cover package updates. Pay special attention to changes in how X feature works.
common.noBranchesFound: No branches available in this repository.
common.instructionsRequired: Instructions are required in single-branch mode.
common.editTemplateHelp: Update the template name and content. Your changes will apply immediately after saving.
common.nameRequired: A name is required to save.
common.templateContentHelp: Describe how the assistant should behave. Markdown is supported.
common.confirmDeleteHelp: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently remove the template.
common.addTemplateHelp: Create a new template by providing a name and content. You can edit it later.
common.docsBranchExists: A documentation branch already exists for this source branch.
common.docsBranchConflict: Cannot use this documentation branch name.
common.docsBranchConflictDescription: A documentation branch already exists for this source branch. Choose one of the options below to continue.
common.docsBranchConflictInProgressDescription: Documentation is currently being generated for this branch. You cannot delete a branch while it's being generated. Please use the suggested alternative branch name below, or wait for the current generation to complete.
common.newDocsBranchLabel: Use a different docs branch name

projectManager.chooseNewOrExisitingDoc: Choose if you want to create a new documentation repository or link an existing one.
projectManager.llmInstructions: LLM instructions specific to this project (optional)
projectManager.documentationBaseBranchDescription: Select the branch in your documentation repository that new documentation branches will be based on.
projectManager.documentationBaseBranchRequired: Select the documentation base branch before continuing.

home.greeting: Please enter your name below ðŸ‘‡
home.unexistantGitRepoCreate: is not a Git repository. Do you want to create one?
home.templateManagerDescription: Create reusable instruction templates for documentation runs.
home.noTemplates: No templates available yet. Add your first template to get started.
home.welcomeMessage: Select a project from the sidebar to start a documentation generation, or manage reusable templates from the Templates page.
home.newSessionDescription: Resume unfinished documentation work or kick off a brand new session without leaving the home screen.
home.runningSessionsDescription: Agents that are currently running in the background.
home.pendingSessionsDescription: Continue documentation work that has not been committed yet.
home.projectPickerDescription: Select the project where you want to start a new documentation session.

templates.subtitle: Manage reusable instructions that define how documentation should be generated.
templates.listDescription: Choose a template to preview and edit it.
templates.emptyState: No templates yet. Create one below to get started.
templates.detailsDescription: Update the template content and save your changes.
templates.selectPrompt: Select a template on the left to view its details.
templates.createDescription: Define reusable instructions that can be applied to any documentation run.

settings.title: Settings
settings.preferencesDescription: Customize your appearance and language settings

demoEvents.title: Demo Events
demoEvents.noEvents: No events yet. Click Start Demo.

sidebar.deleteProjectDescription: Are you sure you want to delete "{{projectName}}"? This action cannot be undone and will only remove the project link from Narrabyte, not the actual files.

apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.description: Manage your API keys for different providers
apiKeys.allProvidersConfigured: All providers already have API keys configured

models.title: Models
models.description: Enable or disable individual models for each provider.
models.error: Unable to load models. Try again later.
models.defaultModelDescription: Select the default model to be used for documentation generation tasks.
models.noEnabledModels: Enable at least one model to choose a default.
models.confirmDisableDefaultDescription: {{model}} is currently configured as the default model. Once disabled, it will no longer be the default until you select another model.
models.noModelsForProvider: No models available for this provider.
models.providerDisabledHint: All models for this provider are currently disabled.

generations.title: Unfinished Generations
generations.description: Resume documentation generation sessions that haven't been committed yet
generations.noSessionsDescription: There are no pending documentation generation sessions for this project.
generations.sessionDescription: Click to resume this generation session
generations.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this session ?

emptyTab.title: No Session Active
emptyTab.description: This tab doesn't have an active documentation generation session. Load a previous session or start a new one.

sessionSelector.title: Load Previous Session
sessionSelector.description: Select a session to load into this tab
sessionSelector.noSessionsDescription: All sessions are either already loaded in other tabs or there are no saved sessions for this project.

tabCloseConfirm.title: Close Tab {{index}}?
tabCloseConfirm.description: This tab has an active session for branch "{{branch}}". Closing it will move the session to the background.
tabCloseConfirm.descriptionRunning: A documentation generation is currently running for branch "{{branch}}". Closing this tab will move it to the background, but the generation will continue.

projectSettings.title: Project Settings
projectSettings.subtitle: Configure repository paths and LLM instructions for this project
projectSettings.llmInstructionsDescription: Import a custom LLM instructions file that will be copied to .narrabyte/llm_instructions.md in your documentation repository.

projectSettings.noGitRepoCodebase: Codebase directory does not have an initialized git repository
